content.rendered:
ZKteco oer four kind series of sliding gate opener with dierent input,gate is widely used in various
scenarios. AC series adapt AC motor input support 800/1500kg door and DC series adapt DC motor input series
support 500/800kg door.
When pedestrians block the door during the operation of the machine, the machine will stop running immediately,
so as not to cause harm to the human (adding infrared sensors will make the anti-clamp eect better, without
direct contact with the door)

Note: Only DC series support optional backup battery. AC series do not support. All model support the longest door within 8M

Features
Multi-function
• External alarm lights, infrared devices and other safety equipment.
• Access control system can be connected to realize automatic identication and access control.
ZK-SL800/1500AC
ZK-SL500/800DC

excerpt.rendered:
Motorized Sliding Gate Opener meets the highest
standards in safety 800kg and 12m long.
High quality AC motor
Simplify structure and connection, easy to maintain
Operating Voltage: 370W
Maximum Loading Weight: 800kg
Net Weight: 10.36kg
Gate Opening Speed: 11 to 13m/min
Remote Control Distance: ≥30m
Gate Operating Distance: 12m
Ingress Protection: IP54
